It is better to learn late than never.

No idea, no matter how good, will work if it doesn't get used.

Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
True it is, we only hate those whom we do not know.

It is ignorance that causes most mistakes.

To improve is to change, so to be perfect is to change often.
A little progress each day adds up to big results.
Enjoy every minute of life. Never second-guess life.
Love yourself with the same intensity you would use to pull yourself up if you were hanging off a cliff.
The more perfect a person is on the outside, the more demons they have on the inside.
Always focus on the front windshield and not the rear view mirror.
Challenge yourself to find the good and beautiful thing inside of everyone.
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
The future depends on what you do today.
How you think is as important as as what you think.

Like it or not, this moment is all we really have to work with.

We are all self-made, but only the successful will admit it.
